name: Two Worlds (itch) (Qianrui (Leo) Li Digital Art, niclazy, shivamsingh, Superschnizel, DisplayVj)
name_original: Two Worlds (itch) (Qianrui (Leo) Li Digital Art, niclazy, shivamsingh, Superschnizel, DisplayVj)
description:
TWO WORLDS: is a Platformer where the player has to get across obstacles by traversing across two different worlds. By switching the world back and forth, the player is able to trigger objects that are unseen in order to help them overcome the obstacles.

Controls:

SPACE: JUMP

WSAD: MOVEMENT

SHIFT: RUN

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK: SWITCH WORLD

ESC: PAUSE MENU

Latest Build:

Two World Build V4

Current Bug:

Fixed Bug:
